com.jgaap.gui.generics
Class StepProgressIndicator

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.jgaap.gui.generics.StepProgressIndicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class StepProgressIndicator
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Simple class that extends JPanel and represents a single step of a multi-step process. The class allows for an unlimited number of steps, and will change its visual layout appropriately.

Author:
Chuck Liddell
See Also:
Serialized Form
